body.name: Baby Shark Potty Time 3 Button Sound Book, Baby Shark Healthy Habits Sound Books, Interactive Potty Training Books for Toddlers, Learning & Education Toys, Baby Shark Gifts for Babies
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 28 mins
features: Baby Shark's potty training sing-along story book teaches the full potty routine with the help of Mommy Shark, Daddy Shark, and William! Enjoy a super catchy potty training tune presented by Pinkfong that teaches toddlers best practices when using the potty. Perfect for babies, toddlers, and preschoolers who love Baby Shark characters and are starting potty training.

Official Pinkfong Baby Shark sound book that includes 3 press-play buttons with 12 colorfully illustrated pages on non-glaring, highly durable board book. 3 buttons play sound effects plus full-singing song excerpts from the 'Potty Song' YouTube video. Features star-shaped buttons that create a tactile experience to storytime. Mini-sized and portable board book that is perfect for kids to read, sing, and play with.

Features children's favorite song with quality sound, child-friendly designs for kids, and two AAA batteries securely placed under the safety lock cover. Note: Please pull the white tab out of the back of the book before use. Sound buttons require a firm push in exact location to work, which may require assistance for young children.

Best educational toys for babies, infants, toddlers, and preschoolers that introduce multisensory experiences and assist in developing fine motor skills. Practice matching by teaching kids to press audio buttons on the side panel that matches the icon on the top of each page to play the song and sounds. Singing develops listening, memory, and pronunciation skills, which are important to early literacy as well as creativity.

Perfect gifts for boys and girls on any occasion - birthdays, parties, baby showers, road trips, playtime, bedtime, holidays, and more! Enhance bonding time with your kid(s) through Pinkfong sound books. Starring the award-winning Baby Shark, Mommy Shark, Daddy Shark, and William, this is a perfect addition to a little one's toy collection!

Are Batteries Included? How do I replace them and are they safely secured? Yes, three LR44 batteries are included as samples to get started. Only an adult should replace the batteries, following the detailed instructions on the back cover. All batteries are securely locked under a cover that requires a screwdriver to open. Are Pinkfong & Baby Shark sound books safe? Yes! Our sound books are rigorously tested and certified to be safe and durable for use by the recommended age group. If you have any further safety concern, please do not hesitate to reach out to us through Amazon to receive further assistance. The sound feature of the book does not seem to work or function properly. What should I do? We always recommend replacing the old batteries with fresh batteries by following the instructions on the back cover. If this does not fix the issue, please do not hesitate to reach out to us through Amazon Customer Support for further assistance. Do you have any unanswered questions or issues with our product? Please send us a message via Amazon. We are always on standby to answer your questions and make things right with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Baby loves it. It’s a small book. Smaller in size than I thought. But perfect for a toddler to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than I expected but ok

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The book is super cute and my little girl is excited every time she gets to read it. The songs are very catchy and the buttons are easy to push. There is a white tab in the back that you need to pull out before you use the book. I have had no issues with the book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very small book. Easy for little hands. Granddaughter likes to look at it anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as large as I thought
reviews.reviewText: The book is kinda small in size thus making it challenging when toddler sitting on potty trying to read it ... would have given 5 star if book was larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun potty book!
reviews.reviewText: The story is great, the sounds are great! Holding up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect aid in potty training
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves Baby Shark. We use this book at almost each potty break. She loves it, and actually reaches for it herself. I believe it is really helping her in potty training.

Our boy loves baby shark and has been watching the potty song once in a while in order to learn the basics concerning potty time… We got this book for travel and we love it! Super simple, straight to the point, with three button choices.One for “Sit on the potty and pee pee pee”, second is flushing, then last is the water sound with “wash my hands”.Very convenient, our boy loves it and the sound isn’t overwhelming like other toys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not happy about the size of the book for the price the exact same one is in home bargains for 2.99
Granddaughter loved it and helps with fear.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun but a little bit over priced
reviews.reviewText: When I bought it I thought it is baby shark song but it is not. It is a song for potty training
